Event:
...

The main event in this passage is the breakdown and suicidal thoughts experienced by the speaker. The passage mentions the speaker being depressed for about a year, their job sucking, financial stress, and recent separating from their spouse, which led to a breaking point on Saturday, December 30th. The speaker had a major anxiety and depression-fueled breakdown and threatened self-harm, leading to a 72-hour hold over the New Year's weekend. After adjusting their meds and feeling better, they went to counselor and cried, describing their daily mental state. The counselor recommended a vacation, but the speaker is concerned about losing their job.
Post: "Feeling like I'm drowning in my own thoughts, I can't seem to escape the darkness that's consumed me for what feels like an eternity. A year of depression, a job that's sucking the life out of me, financial stress, and a recent separation from my spouse have all taken their toll. I reached my breaking point on Saturday, December 30th, when anxiety and depression fueled a breakdown that left me threatening self-harm. I'm grateful to have made it through that terrifying 72-hour hold over the New Year's weekend, but the fear of losing my job looms large as I struggle to find my footing again. Post: "Despite my best efforts to stay afloat, I feel like I'm sinking deeper into the abyss. Maybe it's me, maybe I'll never be enough for anyone." #depression #anxiety #mentalhealthstruggles #breakdown #selfharm #suicidalthoughts

Event:
Emotional torment and abuse towards a close friend.

The event described in the post is the emotional torment and abuse inflicted upon the author's close friend due to their own insecurities and vengefulness. The author admits to sending hurtful messages, making nasty comments, and even creating an entire Instagram account dedicated to making fun of their friend. These actions caused significant harm to their friend, who was already struggling with issues such as depression and bullying. The author realizes the gravity of their actions and seeks forgiveness, but the damage has already been done.
Post: "I'm forced to confront the ugliness within myself as I reflect on the emotional torment I inflicted upon my dear friend. My own insecurities and vengefulness led me to send hurtful messages, make nasty comments, and even create an entire Instagram account dedicated to mocking them. My actions caused significant harm and I can't help but wonder if I'll ever be able to forgive myself. My friend, who was already struggling with depression and bullying, didn't deserve this from me. I hope that one day, they can find it in their heart to forgive me and that I can learn to love and accept myself so that I never hurt anyone like this again." #emotionalabuse #selfreflection #forgiveness
